title: How to unsubscribe from Hulu
description: You can cancel your Hulu subscription online, through the Hulu app, or through a third-party billing platform like Roku, Amazon, or iTunes. After canceling, you can continue watching Hulu until the end of your current billing cycle.

steps_1.title: Cancel Hulu Subscription via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Hulu subscription via the website:

*   Log into your account on the Hulu website.
*   Go to Account.
*   Select "Cancel Subscription" under the "Subscription" section.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm.

steps_2.title: Cancel Hulu Subscription via Mobile App
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Hulu subscription via the mobile app:

*   Open the Hulu app.
*   Go to Account Settings.
*   Tap Subscription.
*   Select "Cancel Subscription".

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your Hulu subscription. Follow our simple guide to unsubscribe from Hulu online, via the app, or through third-party billing platforms like Roku, Amazon, or iTunes.
